content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule plumbing, electrical, or HVAC appointments. May I have your name, please?
Hi, I was just looking around for help but I'm not sure now. My name's Dorothy.
Thank you, Dorothy. Can you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area?
You know, actually, I don't think I want to go ahead with this. Please don't contact me again.
reason: Customer asked not to be contacted further
